title: Instagram: Video selfies trial to verify age of teens
description: The Meta-owned app is trialling new verification methods to ensure teens meet platform age rules.

title: Toyota recalls electric cars over concerns about loose wheels
description: The bZ4X is the Japanese motor industry giant's first mass-produced all-electric vehicle.

title: Two killed as Nio electric car falls from third floor office in Shanghai
description: Pictures show a gaping hole in the side of car maker Nio's Shanghai HQ, and a smashed vehicle below.
